naslov: Krapanj, kamena kuća 125 m2 - 70 m od mora (prodaja)
opis: Otok Krapanj, u centru mjesta smještena je kamena kuća sa ukupno 125 m2 stambene površine na tri etaže. U prizemlju se nalazi kompletno renoviran i namješten jednosobni stan površine 34 m2, koji se sastoji od kuhinje s blagovaonicom i dnevnog boravka u cjelini, hodnika, spavaće sobe, kupaonice i male natkrivene terase. Vanjske stepenice vode na 1. kat gdje je ulaz u komforni dvoetažni trosobni stan površine 91 m2, koji se sastoji od dnevnog boravka sa izlazom na natkrivenu terasu, kuhinje i blagovaonice, kupaonice, hodnika te unutarnjeg drvenog stubišta koje vodi na 2. kat gdje se nalaze spavaća soba s vlastitom  kupaonicom i malim balkonom, dok druga soba ima vlastitu kupaonicu i terasu, a treća spavaća soba koristi kupaonu na 1. katu. U dnevnom boravku je ugrađen kamin, što omogućuje boravak i u zimskom vremenu. Kuća je kompletno namještena, klimatizirana i spremna za useljenje. Udaljenost do mora 70 m, 200 m do trgovine. Za više informacija i dogovor oko obilaska nekretnine obratite se agentu. The island of Krapanj, in the center of the town there is a stone house with a total of 125 m2 of living space on three floors. On the ground floor there is a completely renovated and furnished one-room apartment of 34 m2, which consists of a kitchen with a dining room and a living room as a whole, a hallway, a bedroom, a bathroom and a small covered terrace. External stairs lead to the 1st floor, where there is an entrance to a comfortable two-story, three-room apartment with an area of ​​91 m2, which consists of a living room with access to a covered terrace, a kitchen and dining room, a bathroom, a hallway and an internal wooden staircase that leads to the 2nd floor, where there is a bedroom with its own bathroom and a small balcony, while the second bedroom has its own bathroom and terrace, and the third bedroom uses the bathroom on the 1st floor. There is a fireplace in the living room, which makes it possible to stay even in winter. The house is fully furnished, air-conditioned and ready to move into. Distance to the sea 70 m, 200 m to the store. For more information and to arrange a tour of the property, contact the agent.
